name: Twin Cobra II
summary:
Twin Cobra II is a 1995 arcade game published by Taito Corporation for the video arcade market. It is the sequel to Twin Cobra. 
 
The game was in development by Toaplan, but it was closed down in 94. Since Taito owned the Tiger-Heli/Twin Cobra rights, being the publishers and all, they let Takumi finish up the game. It was﻿ their first release.
